body:
HAI GUYS!!!

I stopped playing MC at like the beginning of the summer. Idk why, it just kinda happened, unannounced and i left everyone to wonder where I was.

First off, I want to apologize to a few people that I made commitments to before leaving, mainly Lyyris. I must have looked like an ass, saying I would make a team with him and disappearing without a word. I even uninstalled skype cuz i nver used it anymore.

Now that school is starting, and I am kinda bored with all the games in my Steam Library, I need a new way to procrastinate. Playing MC on Avicus or Overcast is one pastime that never gets old. So, I'm back!!! 

And I'm bored so Ask Me Anything!!!

Thanks!
~higger

title: Im back!!! higgerblick5 AMA

I don't think Avicus allows these kinds of posts when you come back after just two months :c

replies.body:
E. Forum Rules

7. Discussions surrounding personal updates is frowned upon as they are meant to be inclusive rather than oriented around a single person. Punishments for this will only be distributed in the event that a user continually uses the discussions for this purpose alone.
8. Attention seeking status updates are prohibited. The Avicus Network forum is not designed to be a social network to keep others up to date with what is going on in your personal or online life, but rather an environment where all users are involved in discussions that pertain to larger and more relatable topics.

replies.body:
When I was making my minecraft account, my friend was over at my house, and we both had watched a lot of youtube minecraft videos and stuff so we knew what it was, and we knew that a premium MC account was a big deal cuz it makes you cool. and stuff. I was freaking out cuz i couldn't think of a name, so I walked away from my computer for five minutes and he had typed in the name and password and pressed enter. I rly like it too, and i use it for other things like Steam, skype, reddit, youtube, and battle.net.

TL:DR

my friend is an asshole, but a creative asshole :)
